description: h4. *Functional Requirements:*

# *Endpoint:* {{POST /api/fraud-detection}}
#* *Request:* Accepts transaction details (amount, user ID, timestamp, etc.).
#* *Response:* Returns fraud likelihood score and recommendation (flagged/not flagged).
#* *Validation:* Ensures all required fields are provided.
#* *Error Handling:* Returns appropriate HTTP status codes and error messages.
# *Endpoint:* {{GET /api/fraud-detection/{transaction_id}}}
#* Fetch fraud analysis details for a specific transaction.
# *Database (MongoDB)*
#* Stores transaction details and fraud analysis results.
# *Scoring Logic*
#* Uses predefined rules and ML model (can be enhanced later).
# *Security*
#* Implements API authentication and request validation.
summary: FD-101: Develop Fraud Detection API
creator.displayName: Pratham Bist
reporter.displayName: Pratham Bist
